response.original_title: QUEENS OF COMBAT: ROME'S FEMALE GLADIATORS
response.overview: The traditional story of the gladiator is dominated by male fighters, drenched in blood and glory. But history has forgotten and, in some cases, deliberately hidden the female gladiators. Called Gladiatrix, they were as much a part of the violent Roman blood sport as the men.
response.title: QUEENS OF COMBAT: ROME'S FEMALE GLADIATORS
